comment:
* implementation of PackageStats associated with a application package.
 *
 * @deprecated this class is an orphan that could never be obtained from a valid
 *             public API. If you need package storage statistics use the new
 *             {@link StorageStatsManager} APIs.

variables.name: packageName
variables.comment: Name of the package to which this stats applies.

variables.name: dataSize
variables.comment:
* Size of the internal data size for the application. (e.g.,
     * /data/data/<app>)

variables.name: cacheSize
variables.comment: Size of cache used by the application. (e.g., /data/data/<app>/cache)

variables.name: externalCodeSize
variables.comment:
* Size of the secure container on external storage holding the
     * application's code.

variables.name: externalDataSize
variables.comment:
* Size of the external data used by the application (e.g.,
     * <sdcard>/Android/data/<app>)

variables.name: externalCacheSize
variables.comment:
* Size of the external cache used by the application (i.e., on the SD
     * card). If this is a subdirectory of the data directory, this size will be
     * subtracted out of the external data size.

variables.name: externalMediaSize
variables.comment: Size of the external media size used by the application.

variables.name: externalObbSize
variables.comment: Size of the package's OBBs placed on external media.

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(Parcel dest, int parcelableFlags)

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(Parcel dest, int parcelableFlags)
